messages.message:
Has anyone else seen local services crashing with the following error message?
```OSError: [Errno 23] Too many open files in system: '/Users/victorzeng/Library/Caches/pypoetry/virtualenvs/webapp-u5vSFH5N-py3.9/lib/python3.9/site-packages/pandas/core/indexes/__init__.py'```

Looks like I have 48590 file descriptors open by `/System/Library/Frameworks/Virtualization.framework/Versions/A/XPCServices/com.apple.Virtualization.VirtualMachine.xpc/Contents/MacOS/com.apple.Virtualization.VirtualMachine`
I’ve seen similar errors when building services in docker and fixed them by switching docker desktop’s virtualization settings away from virtiofs
